messages.title: Only Nick Clegg will Change Britain on May 6th
messages.content: As the election comes to an end, it's clear that people want a bigger change now than ever before. We have fought this campaign on the key issue of fairness.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fair taxation, with a £10,000 tax free allowance for all and pensions index linked.
A fair and sustainable economy, building up jobs in the environment sector.
Reform of parliament and the voting system, an end to massive donations and lobbyists, and an end to the abuses of power by government and MPs.

issues.governance: Reform of parliament and the voting system, an end to massive donations and lobbyists, and an end to the abuses of power by government and MPs.

leaflet.personalStatement: In my first time in 65 years, there's a chance for change in Britain. Only Nick Clegg stands for that change. A vote for Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats is a vote for a fairer Britain, with reform of politics and fairer treatment of the weak and protecting our economy.

images.caption: Jo Shaw, Parliamentary Candidate for Holborn & St. Pancras
